TOKENS: h a y + a
ALIGNMENT: h a y + a
NOTE: the number twenty to ninety cannot be derived from 1-9 by regular morphology and phonological rules. grammar books claim otherwise, but they base their derivation not synchronically but diachronically. 20-90 are much more conservative in their phonology than 1-9, and closer to Ge'ez. Therefore I decided to gloss them as "twenty ty" rather than "two ty" (the /a/, "ty" morpheme is still affixed to them)
